quests.desc: Welcome to another exciting round of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First step, try to travel east. With that accomplished, venture east. With that over with, take a trip south. With that over with, travel west. With that over with, make an effort to go south. Following that, attempt to go west. With that done, pick-up the keycard from the floor of the bedroom. Having picked up the keycard, make an attempt to head south. Then, head east. Okay, and then, Insert the keycard into the chest within the bathroom to lock it. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bathroom. A standard kind of place.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest in the corner.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out a drawer.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_1]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You smell a hideous smell, and follow it to a board. You can't really describe the board besides that it's ordinary. [if there is something on the s_0]On the board you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the board.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a salon.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Canadian style box.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The Canadian style box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a sauna.

 You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box close by.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The box contains [a list of things in the c_3]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a rack. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the rack.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Of every bedroom you could have sauntered into, you had to saunter into an usual one.

 You smell an awful smell, and follow it to a bed. The bed is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bed you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You're now in a garage.

 You can make out a toolbox. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The toolbox is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. The counter is usual.[if there is something on the s_3] On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_3]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] The counter appears to be empty. You move on, clearly done caring about your TextWorld experience.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You are in a bar. A normal one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] usual looking cake scented chest here.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The cake scented chest contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The cake scented chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can make out a desk. [if there is something on the s_4]On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_4]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in a place we're calling a workshop. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've entered a basement.

 You can see a workbench. The workbench is typical.[if there is something on the s_5] On the workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You see a rusty table. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the table. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]The table appears to be empty.[end if] You can make out a counter. The counter is rough.[if there is something on the s_7] On the rough counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] The counter appears to be empty.[end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a splintery table. [if there is something on the s_8]On the splintery table you can see [a list of things on the s_8]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a playroom. A standard kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
Ah, the bedchamber. This is some kind of bedchamber, really great usual vibes in this place, a wonderful usual atmosphere.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a cookery, cool, but is it ordinary? You better believe it is.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
Fancy seeing you here. Here, by the way, being the closet. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a workbench. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a workbench? The workbench is splintery.[if there is something on the s_9] On the splintery workbench you see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. An usual one. Let's see what's in here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You arrive in a studio. An usual kind of place.

 You make out a Microsoft limited edition locker.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The Microsoft limited edition locker contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Microsoft limited edition locker is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've entered a cellar. The room is well lit.

 You can see a table. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've entered a cubicle. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can see a shelf. The shelf is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_11] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_11].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. A normal one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the spare room.

 You see a stand. The stand is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_12] On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_12].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_12] However, the stand, like an empty stand, has nothing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see a non-euclidean chest.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The non-euclidean chest contains [a list of things in the c_7]![end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. An ordinary one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can make out [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] refrigerator here.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.desc: it is what it is, a portal [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First off, venture east. Then, take a trip east. Next, venture south. Next, venture west. That done, attempt to go to the south. After that, move west. Next, retrieve the keycard from the floor of the bedroom. After that, go south. Then, head east. Once you accomplish that, make absolutely sure the chest in the bathroom is locked. And once you've done that, you win!
